ComicInfo.Summary:
There will be blood as Tommy comes face to face with organ-stealing, escaped-brothel-slave Halfpipe (Godkiller's iconic anti-heroine), resulting in the twist of fate that sends Tommy on his dark odyssey into the savage land of Outer City.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ben Templesmith | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Anna Wieszczyk | 4 | 2nd | Second Printing Cover | ? | 2 | 3rd | Third Printing Cover | ? | 3 | Notes:
The Variant cover is a homage of the movie poster for Scarface.
